description.value: Beneath the plates of bone and ice on Ulgrem-Axaan flow the viscous remains of its vital fluids. Creatures coming into physical contact with this fluid must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|name:Ichor Coating] save or become infected with @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-family-ability-glossary.(Ghoul) Ghoul Fever]{Ghoul Fever}.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
